data.title: Board Members in the history of the Bank of Finland
data.meta_description: The Bank of Finland is the national monetary authority and central bank of Finland.
data.text: 2018 Rehn Olli Governor, from 12 July 2018 Liikanen Erkki Governor, until 11 July 2018 Rehn Olli Deputy Governor, from 16 February 2018 until 11 July 2018 Marja Nykänen Deputy Governor, from 15 August 20178 Tuomas Välimäki from 12 July 2018 2017 Liikanen Erkki Governor Hakkarainen Pentti Deputy Governor, until 31 January 2017 Honkapohja Seppo​ Deputy Governor, from 1 February 2017​ until 31 December 2017 Nykänen Marja​ from 1 February 2017​ Rehn Olli from 1 February 2017​​ 2016 Liikanen Erkki Governor Hakkarainen Pentti Deputy Governor Honkapohja Seppo​ ​ 2015 Liikanen Erkki Governor Hakkarainen Pentti Deputy Governor Honkapohja Seppo​ ​ 2014 Liikanen Erkki Governor Hakkarainen Pentti Deputy Governor Honkapohja Seppo​ ​ 2013 Liikanen Erkki Governor Hakkarainen Pentti Deputy Governor Honkapohja Seppo​ ​ 2012 Liikanen Erkki Governor Hakkarainen Pentti Deputy Governor Honkapohja Seppo​ ​ 2011 Liikanen Erkki Governor Hakkarainen Pentti Deputy Governor Honkapohja Seppo​ ​ 2010 Liikanen Erkki Governor Hakkarainen Pentti Deputy Governor Salo Sinikka​ until 15 October 2010​ Honkapohja Seppo 2009 Liikanen Erkki Governor Hakkarainen Pentti Deputy Governor Salo Sinikka Honkapohja Seppo 2008 Liikanen Erkki Governor Hakkarainen Pentti Deputy Governor, from 1 January 2008 Salo Sinikka Honkapohja Seppo from 1 January 2008 2007 Liikanen Erkki Governor Louekoski Matti Deputy Governor Salo Sinikka Hakkarainen Pentti 2006 Liikanen Erkki Governor Louekoski Matti Deputy Governor Salo Sinikka Hakkarainen Pentti 2005 Liikanen Erkki Governor Louekoski Matti Deputy Governor Salo Sinikka Hakkarainen Pentti 2004 Vanhala Matti Governor until 31 March 2004 Liikanen Erkki Governor from 12 July 2004 Louekoski Matti Deputy Governor, Acting Governor from 1 April–11 July 2004 Salo Sinikka Hakkarainen Pentti 2003 Vanhala Matti Governor Louekoski Matti Deputy Governor Salo Sinikka Hakkarainen Pentti 2002 Vanhala Matti Governor Louekoski Matti Deputy Governor Salo Sinikka Hakkarainen Pentti from 1 February 2002 2001 Vanhala Matti Governor Louekoski Matti Deputy Governor from 1 January 2001 Salo Sinikka 2000 Vanhala Matti Governor Ollila Esko Deputy Governor until 31 December 2000 Louekoski Matti Korhonen Matti deceased 29 June 2000 Salo Sinikka from 16 October 2000 (on leave of absence until 31 October 2000) Pikkarainen Pentti Acting Board Member 16–31 October 2000 1999 Vanhala Matti Governor Ollila Esko Deputy Governor Louekoski Matti Korhonen Matti 1998 Hämäläinen Sirkka Governor until 31 May 1998 Ollila Esko Deputy Governor from 1 January 1998 Vanhala Matti Governor from 5 June 1998 Louekoski Matti Korhonen Matti from 1 January 1998 1997 Hämäläinen Sirkka Governor Holkeri Harri until 31 December 1997 Ollila Esko Vanhala Matti Louekoski Matti 1996 Hämäläinen Sirkka Governor Holkeri Harri Ollila Esko Sorsa Kalevi until 30 June 1996 Vanhala Matti Louekoski Matti from 1 July 1996 1995 Hämäläinen Sirkka Governor Holkeri Harri Ollila Esko Sorsa Kalevi Vanhala Matti 1994 Hämäläinen Sirkka Governor Holkeri Harri Ollila Esko Sorsa Kalevi Vanhala Matti 1993 Hämäläinen Sirkka Governor Holkeri Harri Ollila Esko Sorsa Kalevi Vanhala Matti 1992 Hämäläinen Sirkka Governor from 5 April 1992 Holkeri Harri Ollila Esko Sorsa Kalevi Vanhala Matti 1991 Kullberg Rolf Governor Alenius Ele Holkeri Harri Ollila Esko Sorsa Kalevi Hämäläinen Sirkka 1990 Kullberg Rolf Governor Alenius Ele Holkeri Harri Prime Minister, on leave of absence Ollila Esko Sorsa Kalevi Speaker of Parliament, on leave of absence Puntila Markku 1989 Kullberg Rolf Governor
